sentences.en: Achieve healthy looking nails with the dual end cuticle pusher.
sentences.cn: 本款双头的死皮推美甲工具能给您带来健康亮丽的指甲.

sentences.en: Adjust cuticle condition, effectively protect skin's cortex to prevent keratinize excessively.
sentences.cn: 调节角质层状态, 有效保护肌肤皮质层,防止过分角质化.

sentences.en: Also try: Shea Butter Nail and Cuticle Cream.
sentences.cn: 另推荐: 乳木果去甲皮修护霜.

sentences.en: An epidermal layer of cells that secretes an overlying chitinous cuticle, as in arthropods.
sentences.cn: 一种坚硬的半透明角质物质, 节肢动物外骨骼和某些真菌类细胞壁的主要成分.

sentences.en: Availability: This series is applicable for sensitive, weak and damaged skin or skin with thin cuticle.
sentences.cn: 适用范围: 本系列适合于敏感性 、 角质层较薄、脆弱受损肤质使用.

sentences.en: Can you rub in some cuticle cream first and just gently push them back?
sentences.cn: 你可以先帮我擦一些指甲周围表皮专用的柔肤霜,再轻轻将它们往后推 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cuticle from two long - shaped cells.
sentences.cn: 角质层由两种长形细胞组成.

sentences.en: Efficacy : In - depth clean skin, exfoliate cuticle, body fitness, relieve fatigue, vitality glowing.
sentences.cn: 功效: 具有深层清洁 、 软化角质 、 美体塑身 、 舒缓疲劳 、 焕发肌肤活力的功效.

sentences.en: Skin structure is divided into five levels, namely: cuticle, transparent layer, layer tablets, essential layer, layer.
sentences.cn: 皮肤结构共分五层, 分别为: 角质层 、 透明层 、 粒层 、 本质层 、 基底层.

sentences.en: Split ends occur when the cuticle is damaged and the fibres of the cortex unravel.
sentences.cn: 发梢开叉是角质层受损和皮层的纤维开裂所致.

sentences.en: The oil painting under his brush then becomes a layer of cuticle.
sentences.cn: 油画,在这里成为一层表皮.

sentences.en: The old cuticle is digested by molting fluid.
The outer tangential wall of both surfaces had cuticle.
sentences.cn: 上下表皮外切向壁上均有角质膜.

sentences.en: The outermost layer of cuticle of an arthropod exoskeleton, composed mostly of wax.
sentences.cn: 主要为水生的节肢动物,通常身体分节并有壳质的外骨骼.

sentences.en: The'shell " is composed of three structures: the membranes, the mineralized part and the cuticle.
sentences.cn: 蛋壳 由3种结构组成: 膜, 矿物质化部分和壳胶膜.

sentences.en: What about the other parts of the cuticle?
sentences.cn: 有关的角质层的其他部分呢？

sentences.en: What about the other parts of the cuticle? What should you be looking for?
sentences.cn: 有关的角质层的其他部分呢？你应该关注什么？

sentences.en: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.cn: 当陷阱阀门关闭的时候，植物在阀门周围的特殊角质层上分泌粘液，形成不透水密封垫。

words.tran_cn: 使充满蜡状质，使角质化
